name: CoolCat
description:
CoolCat is a 2D top-down survival shooter made for PhillyTron for MAGFest!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move

WASD to shoot

#3 button on keyboard is the "RightBottom Button"

ESC to pause, exit game

Art by Danielle Vuono

Music by Spencer Edgers

Code by Judie Thai

with assistance from Almando Santos and Armond Smith
